update_user.description: Update a user with the given user_id.

update_group.description: Update a user group with the given user_group_id.

update_acl.description: Update an ACL entry with the given ace_id.

update_template.description: Update a template with the given template_id.

update_project.description: Update a project with the given project_id.

update_compute.description: Update a compute on the controller with the given compute_id.

update_pool.description: Update a resource pool with the given resource_pool_id.

update_role.description: Update a role with the given role_id.

add_group_member.description: Add member to a user group with the given user_groupid and user_id.

add_ressouce_to_pool.description: Add resource to a resource pool with the given resource_pool_id and resource_id.

update_role_privs.description: Add a privilege to a role with the given role_id and privilege_id.

update_node.description: Update a node with the given node_id and project_id.

update_drawing.description: Update a drawing with the given project_id and drawing_id.

update_link.description: Update a link with the given project_id and link_id.

update_disk_image.description: Update a Qemu disk image disk_name, node_id and project_id.
